content.question:
Consider the function f given by<math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mi>x</mi> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacI cacaWG4bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaadIhacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGH sislcaWG4bWaaWbaaWqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaaaaa@3F25@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for all real numbers x.

(a) At what value of x does f(x) attain its absolute maximum? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text:
Consider the function f given by<math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mi>x</mi> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOzaiaacI cacaWG4bGaaiykaiabg2da9iaadIhacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGH sislcaWG4bWaaWbaaWqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaaaaa@3F25@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for all real numbers x.

(a) At what value of x does f(x) attain its absolute maximum? Justify your answer.

(c) Find the value of  <math> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>∞</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>, given the fact that  <math> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>∞</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </msup> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>π</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
